SEARCH
Package controller

Class BaseController<T extends MenuUI>

java.lang.Object
controller.BaseController<T>
Type Parameters:
T - The type of MenuUI that the controller interacts with.
Direct Known Subclasses:
AdministratorController, DoctorController, MainController, NurseController, PatientController, PharmacistController
public abstract class BaseController<T extends MenuUI> extends Object
Abstract controller class that serves as a base for specific controller implementations. It provides basic functionality for handling user input and logging out a user.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Celeste Ho

      public abstract void handleUserInput()
